tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CommunicationLogs ( 
  id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  party1 VARCHAR(255), 
  party2 VARCHAR(255), 
  message text, 
  timestamp TIMESTAMP 
)

CREATE TABLE communication_logs (
  log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  party1_id INT NOT NULL,
  party2_id INT NOT NULL,
  message TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE negotiations (
  negotiation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  start_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  end_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  party1_id INT NOT NULL,
  party2_id INT NOT NULL,
  status VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE CommunicationLogs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_date TIMESTAMP,
    party_1 VARCHAR(50),
    party_2 VARCHAR(50),
    message TEXT
) ENGINE=InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE Negotiations (
    negotiation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    negotiation_date TIMESTAMP,
    party_1 VARCHAR(50),
    party_2 VARCHAR(50),
    outcome TEXT
) ENGINE=InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE ConflictHistory (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    conflict_date TIMESTAMP,
    party_1 VARCHAR(50),
    party_2 VARCHAR(50),
    resolution TEXT
) ENGINE=InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE communication_logs (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  party_1_id UUID NOT NULL,
  party_2_id UUID NOT NULL,
  message TEXT NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE negotiation_logs (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  party_1_id UUID NOT NULL,
  party_2_id UUID NOT NULL,
  negotiation_topic TEXT NOT NULL,
  outcome TEXT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE negotiations (
    negotiation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    negotiation_date TIMESTAMP,
    negotiation_topic VARCHAR(100),
    party1 VARCHAR(50),
    party2 VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE resolutions (
    resolution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    resolution_date TIMESTAMP,
    resolution_description TEXT,
    resolved_by VARCHAR(50),
    negotiation_id INT REFERENCES negotiations(negotiation_id)
);
